[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 182]
Reasoning: **My Current Strategy: Flush Focus, Time to Reroll**

Okay, here's the situation. Ante 6, Round 15. I've got a decent amount of cash, $112, and my Joker setup is pretty solid: Gros Michel for the flat +15 Mult, Droll for the Flush synergy (+10 Mult and Polychrome boost), Perkeo to copy consumables, Blue Joker for the flat +94 Chips, and Ramen for that sweet x2 Mult multiplier. I also have Jupiter ready to boost my Flush levels to 4.

My current focus is Flushes, so I am fishing for good consumables. Perkeo is key here, copying the Jupiter. The current shop doesn't really have anything appealing: Sixth Sense is unreliable, The Empress isn't critical for my build at the moment. Riff-Raff gives common jokers, but I have a full Joker board.

I've already rerolled twice this turn, so I need to make the shop count. I've thought about it, and the Empress may be useful later, but for now I want to find something better. I've already realized that I want to keep Jupiter as the only consumable to ensure Perkeo copies it. So I really should avoid buying anything that will mess with this, for now.

I could save the money and hit round select, but with $112 in the bank, I should take another look. I am fishing for:

1.  Planet Packs (Celestial Packs) to find more Jupiter/Mars/etc.
2.  Tarot Packs (Arcana Packs) to get more money or deck manipulation.
3.  Better Jokers (replacing Gros Michel or Blue Joker eventually).

I don't see any boosters or vouchers in this shop, only cards. So, I will do one more reroll, as the current cards don't particularly help me.

Finally, I just need to make sure my Joker order is optimal: it looks fine as it is. Action: `reroll_shop`.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

Analyze the total game state and context above, and respond with the appropriate action to take next."}
reasoning:
**Shop Phase Analysis: Prioritizing Flash Card & Joker Optimization**

Okay, here's the game plan for this shop phase. Ante 6, Round 15, and I have $103. The primary focus right now is to maximize the scaling of "Flash Card" (+2 Mult per reroll). It's currently at +0 Mult and the reroll cost is $8. I need to get this thing up.

First, I need to make sure my Jokers are in the *right* order. I've got a Droll Joker (Polychrome, +10 Mult, x1.5 Mult), Perkeo (Legendary, Negative consumable), Blue Joker (+Chips), Ramen (x2 Mult, which is amazing), and Flash Card (+ Mult). I need to make sure those multipliers are firing at the best possible time.

The general rule is additive mult first, then multiplicative. Flash Card and Droll need to go *before* Ramen. Currently, Flash Card is at the *end*. Not ideal. The ideal order is Blue Joker (Chips) in the front, followed by Flash Card, Droll (with +10 and x1.5), Perkeo (for utility, doesn't matter where it is), and Ramen (x2) at the end. I should rearrange.

Wait, let's confirm. I'm going to *reroll* and I'm going to start with a Flash Card reroll. I need to keep $25 for max interest, but I can afford a few rerolls here. The shop has Trading Card ($4) and Odd Todd ($3), but they're not a priority with my current build. Trading Card would be good if I needed to thin the deck. But I don't. I have 5 really good jokers and don't plan to sell any.

I can't forget about Perkeo. Perkeo triggers at the *end* of the shop. I need to keep Jupiter (Level up Flush) in my consumable slots when I leave the shop so Perkeo can duplicate it.

So, the action plan: I'm going to **reroll the shop** as many times as I can afford. I'll need to keep a balance between scaling the Flash Card and keeping enough cash to generate interest and prepare for future shops. Then, I will **rearrange the Joker order** before I finish, ensuring Flash Card is at the optimal spot.
